text: Ojo in muşrike, ki ʙa kufri xud ʙahramand şudaast, ʙehtar ast, jo on kase, ki dar vaqthoi şaʙ ʙa iʙodat pardoxta, jo dar suçud ast, jo dar qijom va az azoʙi oxirat metarsad va ʙa rahmati Parvardigoraş umed dorad? Bigū: «Ojo onhoe, ki medonand haqiqati dinro ʙo onhoe, ki az din cizero namedonand, ʙaroʙarand?» (Hargiz ʙaroʙar nestand). Tanho xiradmandon pand megirand va farqi ʙajni olimon va çohilonro medonand
